text: Etan Patz was a boy from New York City who was abducted on May 25, 1979 in SoHo. He was declared dead in 2001. His disappearance started the use of milk cartons for missing children in the United States. == Notes == == References == Category:1979 deaths Category:1970s in New York (state) Category:20th century in New York City Category:History of Manhattan Category:Kidnapped American people P Category:Murder in New York (state)
title: Disappearance of Etan Patz
